# The `RawLocationWrapper` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Lightweight class that wraps the location operand metadata of a debug intrinsic.

The raw location may be a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a>, an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdtuple">MDTuple</a>, or a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/diarglist">DIArgList</a>.

Definition at line 243 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">IntrinsicInst.h</a>.

### location&#95;ops() {#a58600c67115e2e8118e00ca77d73172d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>iterator&#95;range&lt; location&#95;op&#95;iterator &gt; RawLocationWrapper::location&#95;ops () const</>}>
Get the locations corresponding to the variable referenced by the debug info intrinsic.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dbgvariableintrinsic">DbgVariableIntrinsic</a> - This is the common base class for debug info intrinsics for variables.

Depending on the intrinsic, this could be the variable&#39;s value or its address.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h/#l00260">260</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">IntrinsicInst.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/intrinsicinst-cpp/#l00074">74</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/intrinsicinst-cpp">IntrinsicInst.cpp</a>.
